name: post-legalEntities-id-checkVerificationErrors
description: Returns the verification errors for a legal entity and its supporting entities.

id.description: The unique identifier of the legal entity.

$ul: **problems**: List of the verification errors.
**errorCode**: The error code mapped to the error message.
**errorType**: The category of the error.
**message**: A short explanation of the issue.
**pspReference**: The PSP reference of the payment.
**status**: The HTTP response status.
